org.pircbotx.cap

Class TLSCapHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pircbotx.cap.EnableCapHandler
      • org.pircbotx.cap.TLSCapHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CapHandler

    public class TLSCapHandler
extends EnableCapHandler
    CAP STARTTLS support *MUST BE LAST CAP HANDLER*. Due to how STARTTLS works and how PircBotX is designed this must be the last CAP handler, otherwise you will receive an "SSL peer shutdown incorrectly" exception
    Author:
    Leon Blakey
